summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear to be implemented: simulation/fake/virtual disclosure copy is removed/replaced in the visible login/dashboard/card/add-money UI, and the HTML document title is updated to a neutral title. However, some additional unrequested changes (styling/theme and hook behavior) were also introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Visual theme overhaul (new warm neutral OKLCH color system and Tailwind theme/shadows) beyond removing simulation-related wording.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to removing simulation/fake/virtual disclosure copy and updating the document title; it explicitly lists unrelated additions as non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication/logout behavior change: LoginButton clears query cache on logout.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include changing the appâ€™s authentication flow (Internet Identity).

hallucinated_features.description: React Query/actor dependency behavior adjustments to prevent modal flash (useUserProfile/useBalance hook changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of removing simulation disclosure copy; this is functional behavior work outside the stated scope.
